name: Lewis Hyman
overview:
Lewis Hyman, Inc. (LHI) was established in 1930 as a family window business in New York City. The business was founded and operated on the principles of quality, service and innovation. Now, over seventy years later, the business has grown and spanned three generations of the Hyman family. These founding principles, however, have remained constant.

LHI markets a wide range of quality home improvement products distributed through home centers, catalog showrooms, warehouse clubs and a variety of other retailers. As one of the world’s largest manufacturers and distributors of ready-made natural bamboo and fabric window treatments, LHI has provided decorators and consumers with distinctive window treatments for over seventy-five years.
